summary:
House to expose or store all your items on 3 floors
Mannequins, display case, daggers,weapons and shields plaques, library, bedroom, kitchen/bar, garden, pool, crafting, chests, etc ...
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=200][color=#C03000][b][i][u]\"Stonewall Garden V3\"[/u][/i][/b][/color][/size][/center]

[center][youtube]yZ9WuNpPzE0[/youtube][/center]
[center]Video by MrBiggenGaming[/center]

Other mod: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30530]Stonewall Manor[/url]


===========
Description
===========
House to expose or store all your items on 3 floors
Mannequins, display case, daggers,weapons and shields plaques, library, bedroom, kitchen/bar, garden, pool, crafting, chests, etc ...

Blacksmith in the yard
4 Merchants (cook, bartender, blacksmith, miscellaneous)
Mannequins fix

House: First floor
Hall: 25 mannequins + 11 Display Cases + 4 Plaques (2 weapons and Shield)
1 Library: Bookshelf 15 x 4 x 11 books (660 books) + 1 Display Cases for 2 books + 2 Chests
1 Bedroom : 2 mannequins + 4 Weapon Racks + 1 Display Cases + Bookshelf (2X11 books) + 4 Display Cases for dagues + 2 Weapon Plaques + 2 Plaques (2 weapons and Shield) + 4 Chests
1 room kitchen / bar: 1 Crafting cooking + barrels, Chests.
A pool with decorative
1 \"garden\" with various ingredients (plants, fish, bees, butterflies ...)
Bedroom followers
-----
House: Second floor
All shrines
Storage priest masks
32 mannequins
36 Display Cases (dagues)
42 Weapon Plaques
32 Shield Plaques
16 Plaques (2 weapons and Shield)
110 Weapon Racks
44 Chests
+various ingredients (plants)
-----
Basement
Crafting:
Blacksmith forge
Smelter
Tanning rack
Enchanting/ Alchemy workbench
Blacksmith sharpening
Blacksmith armor workbench
Woodcutter
Bookshelf (2X11 books)
24 chests
4 mannequins
2 Shield Plaques
1 Plaque (2 weapons and Shield)
5 Weapon Racks
6 Weapon Plaques
+ various ingredients (potions, ingots, gems ...)

Install
=======
Download with Manager
or
Copy the .esp file to (install folder)\\Skyrim\\Data\\

Uninstall
=========
with Manager
or
Delete the .esp file to (install folder)\\Skyrim\\Data\\

Incompatibility
===============
Problems in stairs (slow) with the mod: Enhanced Lights and FX by anamorfus

Version: 3.00: Original version
Version: 3.01: Vicky don\'t cut wood now
Version: 3.02: Better handling of characters in the house.The trunk opening of the foundry is in the right direction. Two lights in addition for outside.
Version: 3.03: Add a horse in the stable. Add a player chest in the yard. Removing the salmons in hall. (I hope)
Version: 3.04: CTD Breezehome: problem solved with Hearthfire

Contact
=======
sandysan

Credits
=======
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Some screenshot use some mods as follows:
Project Reality - Climates Of Tamriel by JJ.com
Sexy Solitude v1 by horrorview
author: sandysan

files.name: Stonewall Garden V3_04
files.changelogHtml: CTD Breezehome: problem solved with Hearthfire
